Util_Infestation.questDescriptionRules.r.li: threatDescription->(*Threat)[hivesCount] insect hives(/Threat) will burrow up from underground.

Util_ManhunterPack.questDescriptionRules.li: threatDescription->a pack of (*Threat)[animalCount] manhunting [animalKind_labelPlural](/Threat) will arrive.

Util_SpawnSiteThreat.questDescriptionRul.li: threatDescription->a new site will appear nearby, where [allSitePartsDescriptions] This threat will remain until you go destroy it.
defaultSiteAppearedLetterText->A new site has appeared nearby.\n\n[allSitePartsDescriptions]
